name: Clunky Rocket: Refueled
description:
Clunky Rocket: Refueled is a retro-style game where you fly a rocket, avoiding hazards like asteroids and comets along the way.

Features:

  • Unlock unique rocket skins.
  • Upgrade your rocket to perform better in the game.
  • Rank in the game's online leaderboards.
  • 16-bit style graphics.
